app.title: Envato - Verify Purchase & Support
app.description: Envato Zendesk Integration to verify item purchases

token.label: Personal Token
token.helpText: Create a personal token for the Envato API via https://build.envato.com/create-token/. Make sure you check 'Verify purchases of your items'

purchasecode_field_id.label: Purchasecode Field ID
purchasecode_field_id.helpText: Enter which custom ticket field contains the purchase code of the customer. The custom field ID number is located on the top of your custom field page (Admin -> Manage -> Ticket Fields -> Your Custom Field). You can use a regular expression field with following regular expression: ^([a-z0-9]{8})-?([a-z0-9]{4})-?([a-z0-9]{4})-?([a-z0-9]{4})-?([a-z0-9]{12})$

purchase_code.placeholder: Type purchase code and press enter ...
purchase_code.no_return_no_code: API did not retun verification, nor any error code.
purchase_code.no_data: API did not return any data.
